<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4366</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Katie Morag Delivers the Mail</string>
            <string language="es">Katie Morag entrega el correo</string>
            <string language="ga">Katie Morag Delivers the Mail</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Katie Morag liefert die Post</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Katie Morag fournit le courrier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Katie Morag entrega o correio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Katie Morag trasporta la posta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Katie Morag παραδίδει το ταχυδρομείο</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Introducing children to the purpose of addresses and how to plan routes is approached through presenting a story in which these topics are central.</string>
            <string language="es">Se les muestra a los niños el propósito de las direcciones y la planificación de rutas, esto se hace mediante la presentación de una historia en la que estos temas son centrales.</string>
            <string language="ga">Feidhm seoltaí a chur i lláthair na ndaltaí agus conas bealaí a phleanáil trí scéala  chur os a gcomhair ina bhfuil na ceisteanna lárnach.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="es">plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Vorstellen der Kinder zum Zweck von Adressen 
und wie man Wege wird genähert durch das Darstellen einer Geschichte 
plant, in der diese Themen zentral sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La présentation des enfants au but des adresses 
et comment projeter des itinéraires est approchée en présentant une
histoire dans laquelle ces sujets sont centraux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introduzir crianças à finalidade dos endereços
e como planear rotas é aproximado com apresentar uma história em que
estes tópicos são centrais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'introduzione dei bambini allo scopo degli 
indirizzi e come progettare gli itinerari si avvicina a through 
presentando una storia in cui questi soggetti sono centrali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εισαγωγή των παιδιών στο σκοπό των διευθύνσεων και 
πώς να προγραμματίσει τις διαδρομές προσεγγίζεται μέσω της 
παρουσίασης μιας ιστορίας στην οποία αυτά τα θέματα είναι 
κεντρικά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
